summary: This document is an email correspondence regarding the agenda for a meeting related to Jeffrey Epstein. It involves several individuals from Deutsche Bank discussing the preparation of materials for the meeting. The email highlights the need for a professional version of the agenda to be prepared by a specific deadline.

persons.name: Caroline Kitidis
persons.context: Caroline Kitidis is coordinating the preparation of the meeting agenda and requests a professional version to be created.

persons.name: Tazia Smith
persons.context: Tazia Smith is involved in the discussion about the meeting agenda and is responsible for revisions.

persons.name: Paul Morris
persons.context: Paul Morris is part of the discussion regarding the meeting agenda and is mentioned as responsible for part of the agenda.

persons.name: Vahe Stepanian
persons.context: Vahe Stepanian is included in the email chain regarding the meeting agenda.

persons.name: Amanda Kirb
persons.context: Amanda Kirb is copied on the email regarding the meeting agenda.

connections.description: Caroline Kitidis is overseeing Tazia Smith's work on the meeting agenda.
Paul Morris and Tazia Smith are collaborating on the meeting agenda.
Caroline Kitidis and Paul Morris are both involved in the preparation for the meeting.
Caroline Kitidis and Vahe Stepanian are part of the same email chain regarding the meeting.
Tazia Smith and Paul Morris are working together on the meeting agenda.

events.title: JE Meeting
events.description: A meeting scheduled to discuss the transfer and position update related to Jeffrey Epstein.

keyFacts: The email discusses the preparation of a meeting agenda for a meeting related to Jeffrey Epstein.
Caroline Kitidis requests a professional version of the agenda to be prepared by 10 AM.
The meeting is scheduled for October 22, 2013, and involves discussions about financial positions.
